SRP.Q: On Railway Cars, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1964 relative to that in 1953 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Railway Cars, the data point in 1964 is {above} and to the {right} of the data point in 1953.

SRP.Q: In 1968, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Electric Trucks relative to Railway Cars?
SRP.A: In 1968, Electric Trucks is {below} Railway Cars in the vertical direction.

NC.Q: Between 1955 and 1959, which line had the highest average Vehicle Maintenance Cost, Railway Cars, Aircraft Engines, or Electric Trucks?
